message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

The paper focuses on understanding and mitigating conflicts between natural body movements and whole-body input systems, which is a key concern in human-computer interaction (HCI) and falls under the sub-category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). The paper also involves the use of multiple cameras and video analysis, which suggests a connection to Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Multimedia (cs.MM). Additionally, the paper discusses the creation of standardized datasets, which could be relevant to Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories.
